traits.name: Blind
traits.description: 'Enemies with {Terror} have a {0%} chance to miss each [Hit]. Whenever an enemy misses a [Hit]: Applies {Terror} to them.'

traits.name: Cosmic Horror
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: Generates {Wild} [Aether] for every enemy with {C0} or more {Terror}.'

traits.name: Cursed
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Applies {1} {Terror} to that enemy.'

traits.name: Eldritch Horror
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Terror} stacks to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Terror} equal to the total amount of {Age} on all allies.'

traits.name: Fear Toxin
traits.description: '{Poison} on enemies with {Terror} does {Wild Damage} and deals [1] extra damage for every {0} {Terror} stacks on the enemy.'

traits.name: Nightmare
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: Deals a {Wild Damage} [Hit] with {3} damage to all enemies with {C0} or more {Terror}.'

traits.name: Panic
traits.description: 'Whenever a {Wild Damage} [Hit] staggers an enemy: {Purges} {0} enemy [Aether] and applies {1} {Terror} to each other enemy.'

traits.name: Peak Calamity
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally [attacks] an enemy with {0} or more {Terror}: Applies {Power} to that ally.'

traits.name: Shadow Meld
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally [attacks] an enemy with {0} or more {Terror}: Applies {Dodge} to that ally.'

traits.name: Slasher
traits.description: '{Attacks} of your allies increase the amount of {Terror} on the [attacked] enemies by {0%}, rounded up, instead of consuming stacks. At the end of your turn: {1%} of all {Terror} stacks on enemies are consumed, rounded up.'

traits.name: Tormentor
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Applies {0;1} {Terror} to that enemy and heals self for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Void Infusion
traits.description: Whenever {Wild Aether} is spent on an ally's {Action}, its second [Hit] does {Wild Damage}. If it's a {Support Action}, it applies {0} {Terror} to each enemy instead.

traits.name: Wild Fear
traits.description: '{Wild Damage} [Hits] of your allies gain +{0} {Poise Damage}.'

traits.name: Age of Fire
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Burn} stacks to all enemies equal to half of the amount of {Age} stacks on this monster.'

traits.name: Beacon
traits.description: 'Whenever one or more {Regeneration} stacks are consumed by an ally: Consumes a {Burn} stack on a random enemy to apply another {Regeneration} stack to the ally.'

traits.name: Burning Desire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: {Shields} all allies for {1}.'

traits.name: Burning Fire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Fire} [Aether] consumed by allies: Applies {Burn} to all enemies.'

traits.name: Burning Mark
traits.description: Allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance} against enemies for every stack of {Burn} on them.

traits.name: Controlled Burn
traits.description: 'For every Aether {purged} or {stolen} by allies: Applies {1} {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'

traits.name: Cosmic Fire
traits.description: Every [3rd] {Fire} [Aether] generated by your allies is converted into {Wild} [Aether]. {Wild} [Aether] also counts as {Fire} [Aether] for the effects of your skills.

traits.name: Electrical Burn
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy reaches [5] {Burn} stacks: Deals a {Fire}/{Wind} [Hit] with {3} damage to that enemy and applies {Dodge} to self.'

traits.name: Enkindled Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Fire} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Fire} damage [Hit] and apply {1;1} {Burn} to {target enemy}.'

traits.name: Kindle
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: Generates {Fire} [Aether].'

traits.name: Overheat
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Triggers {Burn} on each enemy with {C0} or more {Burn} and applies {1;1} {Burn} to this monster for each one.'

traits.name: Overwhelming Heat
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Applies {1} Burn to target enemy for every {Power} stack on this monster.'

traits.name: Rapid Fire
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy gets {attacked} for the second time in the same turn: Triggers {Burn} on them.'

traits.name: Rising Fire
traits.description: 'Whenever {Burn} triggers on an enemy: Applies {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'

traits.name: Conversion Pact
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Deals a {Fire}/{Water} hit to all enemies; damage equals debuffs cleansed or consumed from allies this round.'

traits.name: Cosmic Torment
traits.description: 'For every {0} debuffs applied to allies: Generates {Wild} [Aether].'

traits.name: Healthy Cleanse
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: Cleanses {1} debuffs from each ally. Whenever a debuff is cleansed from an ally: Heals them and {Shields} them for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Peak Performance
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally reaches [4] debuff stacks: Applies {Power} and {Shields} them for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Perseverance
traits.description: 'Whenever a debuff is applied to an ally: {2%} chance to apply {Dodge} to them.'

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} is consumed by an ally: Cleanses {0} debuff stacks from them and applies them to random enemies.'

traits.name: Shared Torment
traits.description: 'Whenever a debuff stack is applied to this monster: Applies the same debuff to another random ally or enemy.'

traits.name: Shielded Torment
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: {Shields} self for {1} for every debuff stack on it.'

traits.name: Tainted Power
traits.description: 'Whenever {Power} is applied to an ally: Applies {Power} and {1;1} {Affliction} to them. '

traits.name: Torment Doubling
traits.description: '{On Action}, if the {Action} applied debuffs to enemies: Applies those debuffs another time to the enemies and to self.'

types.name: TypeAffliction
types.description: This Type focuses on applying debuffs to your own monsters, providing benefits for doing so.

types.name: TypeBurn
types.description: This Type focuses on Burn stacks, which deal increasing damage to enemies whenever they try to use Aether.
